muses.name: Kousaka Honoka
muses.description: Honoka Kosaka is the primary protagonist of Love Live!. She is a second year in Otonokizaka High School. Her image color is orange, though she is often represented with pink. She is also the leader of Printemps, a sub-unit under µ's and the leader and co-founder of the group itself. Her solo album is called Honnori Honokairo!

muses.name: Minami Kotori
muses.description: Kotori Minami is one of the nine main characters in Love Live!. She is a second year in Otonokizaka High School. She is also known as 'Legendary Maid Minalinsky' while working in Akihabara. Her image color is gray, though she is also represented with green or white. She is a member of Printemps, a sub-unit under µ's and co-founder of the group itself. Her solo album is called Kotori, Lovin' You.

muses.name: Sonoda Umi
muses.description: Umi Sonoda is one of the nine main characters in Love Live!. She is a second year in Otonokizaka High School. Her image color is blue. She is the leader of lily white, a sub-unit under µ's and co-founder of the group itself. Her solo album is called Umiiro Shoujo ni Miserarete.
muses.charmpoint: Her long black hair since childhood[

muses.name: Nishikino Maki
muses.description: Maki Nishikino is one of the nine main characters in Love Live!. She is a first year at Otonokizaka High School. Her image color is red. She is a member of BiBi, a sub-unit under µ's. She is also the vice-president of the Idol Research Club and the end of the movie, she was succeeded by Yukiho Kosaka and Alisa Ayase.

muses.name: Hoshizora Rin
muses.description: Rin Hoshizora is one of the nine main characters in Love Live!. She is a first year in Otonokizaka High School. Her image color is yellow, but is also represented with lime-green or teal. She is a member of lily white, a sub-unit under µ's

muses.name: Koizumi Hanayo
muses.description: Hanayo Koizumi is one of the nine main characters in Love Live!. She is a first year in Otonokizaka High School. Her image color is green, though she is also represented with teal and yellow. She is a member of Printemps, a sub-unit under µ's. She succeeded Nico Yazawa as the president of the Idol Research Club after the third years have graduated and at the end of the movie, was succeeded by Yukiho Kosaka and Alisa Ayase.

muses.name: Yazawa Nico
muses.description: Nico Yazawa is one of the nine main characters in Love Live!. Despite her childlike stature, she is actually a third year in Otonokizaka High School. Her image color is pink. She is a member of BiBi, a sub-unit under μ's.

muses.name: Toujo Nozomi
muses.description: Nozomi Tojo is one of the nine main characters in Love Live!. She is a third year in Otonokizaka High School. Her image color is purple. She is a member of lily white, a sub-unit under μ's.

muses.name: Ayase Eli
muses.description: Eli Ayase is one of the nine main characters in Love Live!. She is a third year in Otonokizaka High School. Her image color is ice-blue. She is the leader of BiBi, a sub-unit under μ's.

aqours.name: Takami Chika
aqours.description: Chika Takami is the primary protagonist of Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is a second year in Uranohoshi Girls' High School. Her image color is orange. She is a member of CYaRon!, a sub-unit under the reformed Aqours and the leader and co-founder of the group itself.
aqours.charmpoint: Her three braids next to her ears, her bright smile and self-confidence

aqours.name: Watanabe You
aqours.description: You Watanabe is one of the nine main characters of Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is a second year at Uranohoshi Girls' High School. Her image color is light blue.[2] She is a member of CYaRon!, a sub-unit under the reformed Aqours and co-founder of the group itself.

aqours.name: Sakurauchi Riko
aqours.description: Riko Sakurauchi is one of the nine main characters of Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is a second year in Uranohoshi Girls' High School. Her image color is cherry pink. She is a member of Guilty Kiss, a sub-unit under the reformed Aqours and co-founder of the group itself.

aqours.name: Tsushima Yoshiko
aqours.description: Yoshiko Tsushima, also known as Yohane, is one of the nine main characters of Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is a first year in Uranohoshi Girls' High School. Her image color is gray, but is often depicted as grayish-blue. She is a member of Guilty Kiss, a sub-unit under Aqours.

aqours.name: Kunikida Hanamaru
aqours.description: Hanamaru Kunikida is one of the nine main characters of Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is a first year in Uranohoshi Girls' High School. Her image color is yellow. She is a member of AZALEA, a sub-unit under Aqours.

aqours.name: Kurosawa Ruby
aqours.description: Ruby Kurosawa is one of the nine main characters of Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is a first year in Uranohoshi Girls' High School. Her image color is pink. She is a member of CYaRon!, a sub-unit under the reformed Aqours.

aqours.name: Kurosawa Dia
aqours.description: Dia Kurosawa is one of the nine main characters of Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is a third year in Uranohoshi Girls' High School. Her image color is red. She is a member of AZALEA, a sub-unit under Aqours and was the original co-founder of the group itself.

aqours.name: Matsuura Kanan
aqours.description: Kanan Matsuura is one of the nine main characters of Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is a third year in Uranohoshi Girls' High School. Her image color is emerald green. She is a member of AZALEA, a sub-unit under the reformed Aqours and was the leader and co-founder of the original group itself two years prior to the series before being succeeded by Chika Takami.

aqours.name: Ohara Mari
aqours.description: Mari Ohara is one of the nine main characters of Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is a third year at Uranohoshi Girls' High School as well as the school's chairwoman. Her image color is violet. She is a member of Guilty Kiss, a sub-unit under Aqours and was the original co-founder of the group itself.

nijigasaki.name: Uehara Ayumu
nijigasaki.description: Ayumu Uehara is one of the main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a second year at Nijigasaki High School. She is a member of A・ZU・NA, a unit under Nijigaki. Her image color is light pink.

nijigasaki.name: Miyashita Ai
nijigasaki.description: Ai Miyashita is one of the main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a second year at Nijigasaki High School. Her image color is ultra orange. She is a member of DiverDiva, a unit under Nijigaku.

nijigasaki.name: Yuuki Setsuna
nijigasaki.description: Setsuna Yuki, whose real name is Nana Nakagawa, is one of the main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a second year at Nijigasaki High School. Her image color is scarlet red. She is a member of A・ZU・NA, a unit under Nijigaku, and was the original leader of the group prior to it falling apart.

nijigasaki.name: Nakasu Kasumi
nijigasaki.description: Kasumi Nakasu is one of the main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a first year at Nijigasaki High School. Her image color is pastel yellow. She is a member of QU4RTZ, a unit under Nijigaku.

nijigasaki.name: Tennouji Rina
nijigasaki.description: Rina Tennoji is one of the main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a first year at Nijigasaki High School. Her image color is paper white. She is a member of QU4RTZ, a unit under Nijigaku.

nijigasaki.name: Ousaka Shizuku
nijigasaki.description: Shizuku Osaka is one of the main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a first year at Nijigasaki High School. Her image color is light blue. She is a member of A・ZU・NA, a unit under Nijigaku.

nijigasaki.name: Emma Verde
nijigasaki.description: Emma Verde is one of the main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a third year at Nijigasaki High School. Her image color is light green. She is a member of QU4RTZ, a unit under Nijigaku.

nijigasaki.name: Konoe Kanata
nijigasaki.description: Kanata Konoe is one of the main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a third year at Nijigasaki High School. Her image color is violet. She is a member of QU4RTZ, a unit under Nijigaku.

nijigasaki.name: Asaka Karin
nijigasaki.description: Karin Asaka is one of the main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a third year at Nijigasaki High School. Her image color is royal blue. She is a member of DiverDiva, a unit under Nijigaku.

nijigasaki.name: Mia Taylor
nijigasaki.description: Mia Taylor is a third year student that just recently transferred to Nijigasaki High School and is a member of R3BIRTH, a unit under Nijigaku. She is a recent transfer from New York and is bilingual in English and Japanese. Her image color is platinum silver.

nijigasaki.name: Lanzhu Zhong
nijigasaki.description: Lanzhu Zhong is a second year student that just recently transferred to Nijigasaki High School and is a member of R3BIRTH, a unit under Nijigaku. She is from Hong Kong and speaks Mandarin and Cantonese fluently. Her image color is pink gold.

nijigasaki.name: Mifune Shioriko
nijigasaki.description: Shioriko Mifune is one of the main characters of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. She is a first year at Nijigasaki High School. She is a member of R3BIRTH, a unit under Nijigaku. Her image color is jade.

liella.name: Shibuya Kanon
liella.description: Kanon Shibuya is one of the five main characters in Love Live! Superstar!!. She is a first year at Yuigaoka Girls' High School and the leader and co-founder of Liella!. Her image color is marigold.
liella.favoritefood: Baked Apples, Tomatoes, Hamburger Steak, Café Au Lait

liella.name: Tang Keke
liella.description: Keke Tang is one of the five main characters in Love Live! Superstar!!. She is a first year at Yuigaoka Girls' High School and the co-founder of Liella!. Her image color is pastel blue.

liella.name: Arashi Chisato
liella.description: Chisato Arashi is one of the five main characters in Love Live! Superstar!!. She is a first year at Yuigaoka Girls' High School and a member of Liella!. Her image color is peach pink.

liella.name: Heanna Sumire
liella.description: Sumire Heanna is one of the five main characters in Love Live! Superstar!!. She is a first year at Yuigaoka Girls' High School and a member of Liella!. Her image color is melon green.
liella.favoritefood: Tamago Kake Gohan, Green Tea, Melon

liella.name: Hazuki Ren
liella.description: Ren Hazuki is one of the five main characters in Love Live! Superstar!!. She is a first year and student council president at Yuigaoka Girls' High School and a member of Liella!. Her image color is sapphire blue.

liella.name: Mei Yoheme
liella.description: Mei Yoneme is a main character in Love Live! Superstar!!. She is currently a second year student at Yuigaoka Girls' High School, initially being a first year in the second season (until the final episode where she becomes a second year). She is a member of Liella!. Her image color is rouge.

liella.name: Kinako Sakurakoji
liella.description: Kinako Sakurakoji is a main character in Love Live! Superstar!!. She is currently a second year student at Yuigaoka Girls' High School, initially being a first year in the second season (until the final episode where she becomes a second year). She is a member of Liella!. Her image color is maize yellow.

liella.name: Shiki Wakana
liella.description: Shiki Wakana is a main character in Love Live! Superstar!!. She is currently a second year student at Yuigaoka Girls' High School, initially being a first year in the second season (until the final episode where she becomes a second year). She is a member of Liella!. Her image color is ice green.

liella.name: Natsumi Onitsuka
liella.description: Natsumi Onitsuka is a main character in Love Live! Superstar!!. She is currently a second year student at Yuigaoka Girls' High School, initially being a first year in the second season (until the final episode where she becomes a second year). She is a member of Liella!. Her image color is oninattsu pink.

liella.name: Wien Margarete
liella.description: Wien Margarete is a main character in Love Live! Superstar!!, initially a supporting character. She is a first year student at Yuigaoka Girls' High School, initially a third year junior before enrolling in the second season's finale. She is a mysterious girl who is fixated on Kanon Shibuya. She is a new member of Liella!. She debuted with the song Butterfly Wing when she was still a solo idol. Her image color is lavender.

liella.name: Tomari Onitsuka
liella.description: Tomari Onitsuka is a new main character in Love Live! Superstar!!. She is a first year student at Yuigaoka Girls' High School. She is a new member of Liella!. Her image color is smoky blue.

nijigasaki-support.name: Takasaki Yu
nijigasaki-support.description: Yu Takasaki is the main protagonist of Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club and the anime adaptation's representation of the player character in Love Live! School Idol Festival ALL STARS. She is a second year at Nijigasaki High School, and Nijigaku's manager and song composer. Her image color is black.
